sqlMap.sql:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.PRJ_ID , A.DPL_ID , A.DPL_NM , A.DPL_VER , A.DPL_DT , A.DPL_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.DPL_USR_ID, 1) DPL_USR_NM , A.DPL_DESC , A.DPL_STS_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00001', A.DPL_STS_CD, '1') AS DPL_STS_NM , A.DPL_TYPE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00003', A.DPL_TYPE_CD, '1') AS DPL_TYPE_NM , A.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00004', A.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD, '1') AS DPL_AUTO_AFTER_NM , A.DPL_AUTO_DTM , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.DPL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(A.DPL_AUTO_DTM,'HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DPL_ST_DTM , A.DPL_RESTORE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00005', A.DPL_RESTORE_CD, '1') AS DPL_RESTORE_NM , B.SIGN_ID , B.SIGN_STS_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00004', B.SIGN_STS_CD, '1') AS SIGN_STS_NM , B.SIGN_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_USR_ID, 1) SIGN_USR_NM , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_USR_ID, 6) SIGN_USR_IMG , A.DPL_SIGN_TXT , B.SIGN_TXT , B.SIGN_REJECT_TXT , B.SIGN_DTM , B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID, 1) SIGN_REG_USR_NM , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID, 6) SIGN_REG_USR_IMG , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1000 A, DPL1200 B WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_DEL_CD = '02' AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID(+) AND A.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID(+) AND B.SIGN_DTM = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z IDX_PRJ_DPL_SIGN_DTM ) */ SIGN_DTM FROM DPL1200 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND Z.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) A
WHERE 1=1
UPPER(A.DPL_VER) LIKE '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# )||'%'
UPPER(A.DPL_NM) LIKE '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# )||'%'
A.DPL_USR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
A.DPL_DESC LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
A.DPL_STS_CD = #searchCd#
A.DPL_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#

SELECT ROWNUM RN ,A.PRJ_ID ,A.DPL_ID ,SF_DPL1000_DPL_INFO(A.PRJ_ID, A.DPL_ID,'1') AS DPL_NM ,A.JEN_ID ,B.JEN_NM ,B.JEN_URL ,B.JEN_USR_ID ,B.JEN_USR_TOK ,A.JOB_ID ,C.JOB_RESTORE_ID ,C.JOB_TOK ,C.JOB_TYPE_CD ,C.JOB_DESC ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00002', C.JOB_TYPE_CD, '1') AS JOB_TYPE_NM ,A.JOB_START_ORD ,A.USE_CD ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') as USE_NM ,D.BLD_NUM ,D.BLD_RESULT ,D.BLD_RESULT_MSG ,D.BLD_SEQ ,E.BLD_NUM AS BLD_RESTORE_NUM ,E.BLD_RESULT AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT ,E.BLD_RESULT_MSG AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT_MSG ,E.BLD_SEQ AS BLD_RESTORE_SEQ ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1300 A LEFT JOIN JEN1000 B ON(B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID) LEFT JOIN JEN1100 C ON(C.LIC_GRP_ID = B.LIC_GRP_ID AND C.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND C.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID) LEFT JOIN DPL1400 D ON(D.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND D.DPL_ID = A.DPL_ID AND D.JEN_ID = C.JEN_ID AND D.JOB_ID = C.JOB_ID AND D.BLD_SEQ = SF_DPL1400_LAST_INFO(A.PRJ_ID,A.DPL_ID,A.JEN_ID,A.JOB_ID,'8')) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM DPL1400 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.BLD_SEQ = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z PK_DPL1400 ) */ BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1400 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = Y.PRJ_ID AND Z.DPL_ID = Y.DPL_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = Y.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = Y.JOB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) E ON (E.PRJ_ID = D.PRJ_ID AND E.DPL_ID = D.DPL_ID AND E.JEN_ID = D.JEN_ID AND E.JOB_ID = C.JOB_RESTORE_ID AND E.BLD_MAIN_NUM = D.BLD_NUM) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.USE_CD = '01' AND B.USE_CD = '01' AND C.USE_CD = '01'
AND UPPER( A.JOB_ID ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND UPPER( C.JOB_DESC ) like '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# ) ||'%'
AND C.JOB_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#
ORDER BY A.JOB_START_ORD
sqlMap.select:
SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE T1.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE 1=1 AND T1.DPL_ID = #dplId#

SELECT T1.* FROM (
) T1 WHERE T1.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#
SELECT A.REQ_ID FROM DPL1100 A WHERE 1=1 AND a.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_DEL_CD = '02' AND a.DPL_ID IN ($dplIds$)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE DPL1000 A SET A.DPL_DEL_CD = '01' WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId#

UPDATE DPL1000 SET DPL_NM = #dplNm# , DPL_VER = #dplVer# , DPL_DT = #dplDt# , DPL_USR_ID = #dplUsrId# , DPL_DESC = #dplDesc# , DPL_STS_CD = #dplStsCd# , DPL_TYPE_CD = #dplTypeCd# , DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD= #dplAutoAfterCd# , DPL_AUTO_DTM = #dplAutoDtm# , DPL_RESTORE_CD = #dplRestoreCd# , DPL_SIGN_TXT = #dplSignTxt# , MODIFY_DTM = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) , MODIFY_USR_ID = #regUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #regUsrIp#
WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND DPL_ID = #dplId#
UPDATE DPL1000 SET DPL_STS_CD = #dplStsCd# , MODIFY_DTM = (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND DPL_ID = #dplId#
UPDATE REQ4100 SET DPL_ID = NULL WHERE PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND DPL_ID = #dplId#
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT #licGrpId# AS LIC_GRP_ID , ROWNUM RN , DPL_ID , DPL_NM , DPL_DT , PRJ_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(DPL_USR_ID, 1) DPL_USR_ID , DPL_DESC , DPL_STS_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00001', DPL_STS_CD, '1') AS DPL_STS_NM , DPL_VER , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(DPL_USR_ID, 1) AS DPL_USR_NM
FROM DPL1000 A WHERE PRJ_ID = #prjId#
A.DPL_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(DPL_USR_ID, 1) LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
A.DPL_VER LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%'
sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM (
) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,A.DPL_ID ,SF_DPL1000_DPL_INFO(A.PRJ_ID, A.DPL_ID,'1') AS DPL_NM ,A.JEN_ID ,A.JOB_ID ,B.JOB_RESTORE_ID ,A.BLD_SEQ ,A.BLD_NUM ,C.BLD_MAIN_NUM ,A.BLD_RESULT ,A.BLD_RESULT_MSG ,A.BLD_DURATION_TM ,A.BLD_START_DTM ,A.BLD_CONSOLE_LOG ,C.BLD_NUM AS BLD_RESTORE_NUM ,C.BLD_RESULT AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT ,C.BLD_RESULT_MSG AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT_MSG ,C.BLD_CONSOLE_LOG AS BLD_CONSOLE_RESTORE_LOG ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1400 A LEFT JOIN JEN1100 B ON(B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND B.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM DPL1400 Y WHERE 1=1 AND Y.BLD_SEQ = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z PK_DPL1400 ) */ BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1400 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = Y.PRJ_ID AND Z.DPL_ID = Y.DPL_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = Y.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = Y.JOB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) C ON (C.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND C.DPL_ID = A.DPL_ID AND C.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND C.JOB_ID = B.JOB_RESTORE_ID AND C.BLD_MAIN_NUM = A.BLD_NUM) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND A.BLD_SEQ = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z PK_DPL1400 ) */ BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1400 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND Z.DPL_ID = A.DPL_ID AND Z.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 )

SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,A.DPL_ID ,SF_DPL1000_DPL_INFO(A.PRJ_ID, A.DPL_ID,'1') AS DPL_NM ,A.JEN_ID ,A.JOB_ID ,B.JOB_RESTORE_ID ,A.BLD_SEQ ,A.BLD_NUM ,A.BLD_MAIN_NUM ,A.BLD_RESULT ,A.BLD_RESULT_MSG ,A.BLD_DURATION_TM ,A.BLD_START_DTM ,A.BLD_CONSOLE_LOG ,'' AS BLD_RESTORE_NUM ,'' AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT ,'' AS BLD_RESTORE_RESULT_MSG ,'' AS BLD_CONSOLE_RESTORE_LOG ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID ,A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1400 A LEFT JOIN JEN1100 B ON(B.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND B.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND B.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# AND A.BLD_SEQ = #bldSeq#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM DPL1300 A WHERE 1=1 AND PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND DPL_ID = #dplId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT 'BLD' AS TYPE , A.PRJ_ID , A.DPL_ID , A.JEN_ID , A.JOB_ID , A.BLD_SEQ , A.BLD_NUM , A.BLD_RESULT AS RESULT ,SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00002', Z.JOB_TYPE_CD, '1') AS TYPE_NM , A.REG_DTM AS START_DTM , A.BLD_RESULT_MSG AS RESULT_MSG , A.REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, 1) AS REG_USR_NM , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, 6) AS REG_USR_IMG FROM DPL1400 A LEFT JOIN JEN1100 Z ON(Z.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# AND Z.JEN_ID = A.JEN_ID AND Z.JOB_ID = A.JOB_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# UNION ALL SELECT 'SIG' AS TYPE , B.PRJ_ID , B.DPL_ID , '' AS JEN_ID , B.SIGN_TXT AS JOB_ID , 0 AS BLD_SEQ , 0 AS BLD_NUM , B.SIGN_STS_CD AS RESULT , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00004', B.SIGN_STS_CD, '1') AS TYPE_NM , B.SIGN_DTM AS START_DTM , B.SIGN_REJECT_TXT AS RESULT_MSG , B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID, 1) AS REG_USR_NM , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID, 6) AS REG_USR_IMG FROM DPL1200 B WHERE 1=1 AND B.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND B.DPL_ID = #dplId#
) C ORDER BY C.START_DTM DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, T1.* FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID ,A.DPL_ID ,A.JEN_ID ,A.JOB_ID ,A.BLD_SEQ ,A.BLD_NUM ,A.BLD_RESULT ,A.BLD_RESULT_MSG ,A.BLD_DURATION_TM ,A.BLD_START_DTM ,A.REG_DTM ,A.REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.REG_USR_ID, 1) AS REG_USR_NM ,A.REG_USR_IP ,A.MODIFY_DTM ,A.MODIFY_USR_ID ,A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1400 A JOIN ( SELECT Z.PRJ_ID, Z.DPL_ID, Z.JEN_ID, Z.JOB_ID, Z.BLD_NUM,MAX(BLD_SEQ) AS MAX_BLD_SEQ FROM DPL1400 Z WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY Z.PRJ_ID, Z.DPL_ID, Z.JEN_ID, Z.JOB_ID, Z.BLD_NUM ) B ON(A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID AND A.JEN_ID = B.JEN_ID AND A.JOB_ID = B.JOB_ID AND A.BLD_NUM = B.BLD_NUM AND A.BLD_SEQ = B.MAX_BLD_SEQ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.BLD_NUM > 0 AND A.JEN_ID = #jenId# AND A.JOB_ID = #jobId# ORDER BY A.BLD_NUM DESC ) T1 ) T2 WHERE 1=1
AND RN <= 100 /* 100건까지 */

SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_CHG_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_CHG_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'CHG' || TO_CHAR((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0), 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_CHG_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(CHG_ID) AS NEW_CHG_ID FROM DPL1500 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# AND A.CHG_ID LIKE 'CHG' || TO_CHAR((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0), 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' )
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO DPL1500 A ( PRJ_ID ,DPL_ID ,CHG_ID ,CHG_NUM ,CHG_TYPE_CD ,CHG_NM ,CHG_OPT_TYPE_CD ,CHG_COMMON_CD ,PRE_VAL ,CHG_VAL ,CHG_USR_ID ,CHG_DTM ,REG_DTM ,REG_USR_ID ,REG_USR_IP ) VALUES ( #prjId# ,#dplId# ,#chgId# ,#chgNum# ,#chgTypeCd# ,#chgNm# ,#chgOptTypeCd# ,#chgCommonCd# ,#preVal# ,#chgVal# ,#chgUsrId# ,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) ,(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) ,#regUsrId# ,#regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT 'MOD' AS TYPE , A.PRJ_ID ,A.DPL_ID ,A.CHG_ID ,A.CHG_NUM ,A.CHG_TYPE_CD ,CASE A.CHG_OPT_TYPE_CD WHEN '04' THEN SF_REQ4100_REQ_INFO(A.PRJ_ID,A.CHG_NM,'1') ELSE A.CHG_NM END AS CHG_NM ,CASE A.CHG_OPT_TYPE_CD WHEN '02' THEN SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#,A.CHG_COMMON_CD, A.PRE_VAL,'1') WHEN '03' THEN SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.PRE_VAL,'1') WHEN '04' THEN A.CHG_NM ELSE A.PRE_VAL END AS PRE_VAL ,CASE A.CHG_OPT_TYPE_CD WHEN '02' THEN SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#,A.CHG_COMMON_CD, A.CHG_VAL,'1') WHEN '03' THEN SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.CHG_VAL,'1') ELSE A.CHG_VAL END AS CHG_VAL ,A.CHG_USR_ID ,SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.CHG_USR_ID,'1') AS REG_USR_NM ,SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.CHG_USR_ID,'2') AS REG_USR_EMAIL ,SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(A.CHG_USR_ID,'6') AS REG_USR_IMG ,A.CHG_DTM ,A.REG_DTM, A.REG_USR_ID, A.REG_USR_IP FROM DPL1500 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_ID = #dplId# ORDER BY A.CHG_ID DESC, A.CHG_NUM, A.CHG_DTM DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , C.LIC_GRP_ID , A.PRJ_ID , A.DPL_ID , A.DPL_NM , A.DPL_VER , A.DPL_DT , A.DPL_USR_ID , A.DPL_DESC , A.DPL_STS_CD , A.DPL_TYPE_CD , A.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD , A.DPL_AUTO_DTM , A.DPL_RESTORE_CD , B.SIGN_ID , B.SIGN_STS_CD , B.SIGN_USR_ID , B.SIGN_TXT , B.SIGN_DTM , B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(A.DPL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') || ' ' || TO_CHAR(A.DPL_AUTO_DTM,'HH24:MI:SS'),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS DPL_ST_DTM FROM DPL1000 A, DPL1200 B, PRJ1000 C WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_STS_CD = '01' AND A.DPL_TYPE_CD = '01' AND A.DPL_DEL_CD = '02' AND B.SIGN_STS_CD = '02' AND A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID(+) AND A.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID(+) AND C.PRJ_ID = A.PRJ_ID AND B.SIGN_DTM = ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC (Z IDX_PRJ_DPL_SIGN_DTM ) */ SIGN_DTM FROM DPL1200 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND Z.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 ) ) A WHERE 1=1 AND A.DPL_ST_DTM > (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP+0) ORDER BY A.DPL_ST_DTM
